I can verify similar symptoms from my setup. Working backwards in the default branch, the issues seems to arise with this commit/merge (rev=186): #!/osrf/vmrc/commits/3e6600a0c6ba6731087a34fa4fbbcad8f1d5f170

For me the default branch was operational prior to the commit, but not after.

@kev-the-dev , @caguero - can you see if the most recent default branch works for you?
